author: Justin Leavitt
comment: BEST.  CALENDAR. WATCH FACE.  EVER!  I have tried and dropped 7 or 8 different calendar watch faces. My life planning depends on seeing my appointments on my watch face.  This is exactly what I was looking for.  I uninstalled Microsoft Outlook to go with this. Outlook was buggy, sometimes didn't show my events, and took way too long to load events onto the watch face.  This app is smooth and immediate.  Dev: I would gladly pay for the ability to change colors, especially to assign colors to different calendars.  But not if it makes the app buggy.  The smooth simplicity of this is what I love about it.  Very, very, VERY well done!

author: Dean Lewis
comment: Does the job, keeps me knowing what's coming up and gives a visual for how long the event will continue.  With Android Wear 2.0 a watch face doesn't need to do everything because it's easy to switch between favorites, so it's this and a seperate dedicated weather face.

author: Joao Carlos
comment: Really loving this thing. I have multiple events during the day, it's this kind of app that makes the watch shine.  Really appreciate it Dev, kudos!

author: Andrew Carreiro
comment: Love the watch, looks great and is quick and easy to see my daily agenda. Would just like some more options like color, numbers on analog, notches on/off, etc. Still awesome watch face.
title: Simply done and almost perfect

author: Adam J
comment: Works well for giving me a list of upcoming events on my calendar, just wished those color bars were visible on a square watch face. I'm using a Sony Smartwatch 3 and it doesn't look the same as seen in the screenshots. It's still usable, just wish that feature worked for my watch is all.

author: Erika Berger
comment: Would be nice to change the color of the hand, or have black and white version... more customization
title: Simple and I like it, could be more

author: Tungjen García
comment: Didn't display the upcoming calendar events. Defeats the whole purpose.

author: Alan Mc Gill
comment: Does what it says, looks very clean on a square watch face. My go to face for over a year. If it's not broken, don't fix it. So why change.

author: Alexandar Angelov
comment: Really nice and useful watch face. The only thing which will be nice to have is battery level information.

author: Ho Chang Jun
comment: Fantastic and free! Wished it could have more options for the design such as background image, or different watch faces.

author: Vicky Lahkar
comment: must have for work junkies

author: Lex Leonard
comment: Can't select calendars

author: Daniel Grible
comment: Sleek and utilitarian.   Very minimalist.   I would appreciate a pedometer on the screen.

author: Lee Prescott
comment: Won't show my Gmail / exchange calendar........... Hello !!!!!!!!

author: Matej Cibic
comment: Excellent

author: Max Sergeyenko
comment: Thank you! Now it's awesome! 1 little picky thing is that I like leading zeros: 01:00am instead of 1:00am lol but not a big deal. Thank you! :)

reply.author: eChef
reply.content:
Just made an update which includes an option to show more than one event.
Choice of calendars might be a bit harder but if I get the time I'll try to do that.

title: Amazing! Added what I asked for!

author: Andrew Kirk
comment: Been looking for something like this. I'm forgetful so having notification on my watch is great. Works a treat on my g watch r. Well done Mr developer.
title: Brill

author: Amir Masoud
comment: Suggestion,  Ability to change some settings,  and ability to show two or more event

reply.author: eChef
reply.content: Just added an option to show multiple events (up to 3). Take a look!

title: Perfect

author: Enrique E. de Orta
comment: Needs bigger text for appointments
title: Nice

author: Shaojin Ma
comment: Would it be possible to add step counter ?
title: Really beautiful, only one suggestion
